content: this crochet pattern is a nice modern tree skirt it has nice texture and contrast this pattern can be made in 2 different sizes **yarn ** #5 bulky weight big twist classic or lion brand boogie nights 455 505 yards main color a 320 370 yards contrast color b or suitable substitutes ** both yarns used in sample were very thin bulky weight yarns so be sure to check gauge ** **size ** small large circumference - 106 122 width - 33 39 **skills & techniques used ** you will need to know how to work in row work in the back loop only follow instructions for a special stitch know basic crochet stitches such as single_crochet and double_crochet know how to work a front post stitch **hook size ** us size k/10 5 6 5mm crochet hook **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
